name: Sling Car Drift: Racing Cars
description:
Sling Car Drift: Racing Cars allows you to try a new car driving simulator experience. Car racing games are being played by almost everyone.  You’ll forget all other Car off road driving games or car parking games after playing this unique kind of car drift game. This car drifting game is having a new idea for car racers in racing world. It is a simple car simulation game that you should not miss it. In this 2D car simulator game is actually track driving game.

In Sling Car Drift: Racing Cars you all need to use your best driving skills to win the car drifting game challenge. There are different road racing tracks for this drifting game. This game is neither like car parking games nor car off road driving games. There are some magnets which through your car simulator to make car drift like car stunt games. So be careful and avoid from car crash in this driving simulator.

Game Features:
* Different sling cars on exciting racing tracks
* Exciting Car driving simulation games fun with this car driving game
* Smooth controls and easy game play for car drifting 
* Variety of sports cars for thrilling ride

Sling Car Drift: Racing Cars is very cool car drifting game with realistic car drifting experience. Car games are playing by billions of users and have big fan following round the globe. Sling Car simulation games are the best racing games in all play store categories. There are some magnets that sling your car forward for car drift. Virtual driving is a real fun for car lovers. Enjoy the fun of car racing and drifting games with this simulation game.
